method.name: delete_slot
method.description: Deletes the slot with the given [param key]. Returns [code]false[/code] if it fails.

method.name: get_slot
method.description: Gets the value stored in the slot with the given [param key]. Returns [code]null[/code] if it fails.

method.name: new_slot
method.description: Creates a slot with the given [param key] if it does not already exist, then assigns [param value] to the slot. This is the closest equivalent to [code]dictionary[key] = value[/code] in GDScript. Returns [code]false[/code] if it fails.

method.name: set_delegate
method.description: Assigns a new [url=http://www.squirrel-lang.org/squirreldoc/reference/language/delegation.html]delegate[/url] to this [SquirrelTable]. Returns [code]false[/code] if it fails.

method.name: set_slot
method.description: Assigns a [param value] to the slot with the given [param key]. Returns [code]false[/code] if it fails.

method.name: size
method.description: Returns the number of slots in the [SquirrelTable].

method.name: wrap_callables
method.description: Convenience function that calls [method SquirrelVMBase.wrap_callable] on each of the [param callables] and assigns them to the table using [method new_slot].
